name: Chefkün
description:
DON'T PLAY if you're looking for a complete experience!

This is a game made for #Devtober game jam, and still in progress. Right now, it's barely a demo with functioning menus a couple of sounds.

This week I'm going to try adding a couple of extra traps. Specifically, a laser and a moving saw, as well as despairing platforms.

After that it's done, I'll move to the levels

if I manage to do all that, then I'll start with the sounds and juicing the game.
